title: Mac download
body: I had about a 6 hour download for about 5GB's so then I come on the next day hoping to play some league of legends for the first time ever, and it starts the whole proses again, what is going on please help i can't play like i want to. (Sorry about my grammar/spelling)

replies.body: Is your Mac set to go to sleep at a certain period?  It's possible that the patcher may have been stopped at some point during the download.  If t here's an interruption or it closes out, then the patcher needs to recan files to make sure nothing is corrupt.  Once the scan is complete, it can resume with downloading the patch.  Unless you have any error messages, your best bet is to just let it do its thing without any interruptions.  Hang tight until it's done!
